name: QuantitativePolymeraseChainReactionTestOfBCRABL1
title: Quantitative Polymerase Chain Reaction Test of BCR ABL1
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts related to qPCR tests indicating the transcipt levels of BCR ABL1.),(Data Element Scope: This would use the Laboratory Test QDM category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Quantitative laboratory tests of blood/tissue, which are specific to the International Standard.),(Exclusion Criteria: Quantitative laboratory tests not meeting inclusion criteria.)
